Package org.example.ui

Class CmdUserIO

java.lang.Object
org.example.ui.CmdUserIO
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserIO
public class CmdUserIO extends Object implements UserIO
Command line/console user I/O for the vending machine program.

    • welcome

      public boolean welcome(ArrayList<String> inventory)
      Welcomes the user, provides a list of available stock, and gives them the option to add currency or exit.
      Specified by:
      welcome in interface UserIO
      Parameters:
      inventory - An ArrayList containing the string representation of all stock in the inventory.
      Returns:
      true if the user wishes to add currency, false if they wish to exit.

      Specified by:

      Returns:
      The money to be added, in BigDecimal format.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      moneyEntered - the money added to the balance
      balance - the total balance

    • offerPurchase

      public int offerPurchase(int[] IDs)
      Offers the user the opportunity to buy an item from the inventory.
      Specified by:
      offerPurchase in interface UserIO
      Parameters:
      IDs - An int array if all IDs that could be bought by the user.
      Returns:
      The ID from the array corresponding to the relevant item.

    • confirmPurchase

      Confirm to the user that the purchase has succeeded.
      Specified by:
      confirmPurchase in interface UserIO
      Parameters:
      boughtItem - the bought item
      change - the change equivalent of the remaining balance.
